[00:00.00]Roses (Explicit) - Benny Blanco/Juice WRLD/Brendon Urie
[00:00.23]Lyrics by：Benjamin Levin/Magnus August Höiberg/Nathan Perez/Jared Higgins/Brendon Urie
[00:00.47]Composed by：Benjamin Levin/Magnus August Höiberg/Nathan Perez/Jared Higgins/Brendon Urie
[00:00.71]Produced by：benny blanco/Cashmere Cat/Happy Perez
[00:00.95]Juice WRLD：
[00:11.47]Ayy ayy uh
[00:13.39]Roses are red violets are blue
[00:16.13]Check
[00:16.59]My heart is dead I'm such a fool
[00:19.92]Why did I fall for you
[00:23.10]I gave it all for you

[00:32.95]Why did I fall for you
[00:36.14]I gave it all for you
[00:39.88]Feelin' lost don't know what to do
[00:42.57]But I just got some head in the back of my coupe
[00:45.96]Still feelin' dead when I think about you
[00:49.32]I can't do a d**n thing when I'm without you
[00:52.59]I'ma take a trip to the past off the shrooms
[00:55.30]Off the acid
[00:58.33]Then I'll f**k a bad b***h
[01:00.67]Uh ayy call me young savage
[01:03.91]But I'm ballin' like a young Maverick
[01:06.97]This heartbreak music is such a passion
[01:10.48]I thought I left it inside the past-tense
[01:13.71]You gave me your heart it was made of plastic
[01:17.01]No father-havin' I'm a bastard
[01:20.94]At least I'm a rich one
[01:22.99]You need a real n***a you should go get one
[01:26.26]So many h*es in my face I could pick one
[01:29.65]Make her pop it like a zit huh
[01:31.74]Roses are red
[01:32.98]Check
[01:33.42]Violets are blue
[01:34.46]Check

[01:36.12]Check

[01:54.52]I gave it all for you
[01:57.29]Brendon Urie：
[01:57.80]Say you want my love and I believe you
[02:01.11]But every look you give it's like I'm see-through
[02:04.43]Show me that you want me like I need you
[02:08.40]And I need you yeah
[02:11.12]Say you want my love and I believe you
[02:14.12]But every look you give it's like I'm see-through
[02:17.48]Show me that you want me like I need you
[02:21.39]And I need you
[02:22.84]Brendon Urie/Juice WRLD：
[02:23.90]Roses are red violets are blue
[02:27.21]My heart is dead I'm such a fool
[02:30.13]Check

[02:49.79]Juice WRLD：
[03:04.64]She let me on the loose
[03:06.45]Love around my neck startin' to feel like the noose
[03:09.77]All of the lies startin' to feel like the truth
[03:12.53]At the end of the day b***h I'm lyin' flippin' you
[03:17.34]I'm sick of bein' ridiculed
[03:19.29]You playin' with my heart you made me look like a fool
[03:22.77]This a tragedy it may end up on the news
[03:26.06]I don't got no time for anyone not these fools
[03:29.11]No no oh oh
[03:31.80]At the end of the day what are you gon' do
[03:34.63]Ooh at the end of the day I don't wanna be with you
[03:37.89]Ooh at the end of the day I'ma still keep it true true true
data.trans:
[ti:Roses (Explicit)]
[ar:Benny Blanco/Juice WRLD/Brendon Urie]
[al:Roses (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.47]//
[00:00.71]//
[00:00.95]//
[00:11.47]//
[00:13.39]玫瑰是红的 紫罗兰是蓝的
[00:16.13]//
[00:16.59]我的心死了 我真是个傻瓜
[00:19.92]为何我会爱上你
[00:23.10]我为你付出了一切
[00:26.49]玫瑰是红的
[00:27.69]//
[00:28.17]紫罗兰是蓝的
[00:29.19]//
[00:29.55]我的心死了
[00:30.82]//
[00:31.33]我真是个傻瓜
[00:32.43]//
[00:32.95]为何我会爱上你
[00:36.14]我为你付出了一切
[00:39.88]感觉很迷茫 不知所措
[00:42.57]但我刚在车里和别的女人亲热了
[00:45.96]一想到你 我就心如死灰
[00:49.32]没有你 我什么也做不了
[00:52.59]我要像以前一样 用特殊药物
[00:55.30]来麻醉自己
[00:58.33]然后找个女人睡一觉
[01:00.67]叫我Young Savage吧
[01:03.91]但我现在拽翻天 就像达拉斯小牛队一样
[01:06.97]这悲伤的音乐真是让人沉醉
[01:10.48]我以为那些都已成了过去式
[01:13.71]你把心交给我 但那是颗塑料心
[01:17.01]从小没爹养 我是个私生子
[01:20.94]如今我至少是个有钱人了
[01:22.99]你想要真正的男子汉 那你就去找啊
[01:26.26]我身边女人多得是 我可以随便挑
[01:29.65]我可以让她任我摆布
[01:31.74]玫瑰是红的
[01:32.98]//
[01:33.42]紫罗兰是蓝的
[01:34.46]//
[01:34.90]我的心死了
[01:36.12]//
[01:36.60]我真是个傻瓜
[01:37.73]//
[01:38.32]为何我会爱上你
[01:41.45]我为你付出了一切
[01:44.81]玫瑰是红的
[01:46.11]//
[01:46.33]紫罗兰是蓝的
[01:47.60]//
[01:48.05]我的心死了
[01:49.33]//
[01:49.76]我真是个傻瓜
[01:50.77]//
[01:51.25]为何我会爱上你
[01:54.52]我为你付出了一切
[01:57.29]//
[01:57.80]你说你想要我的爱 我信了你
[02:01.11]但你总是忽略我 仿佛我是透明人
[02:04.43]告诉我 你是不是像我需要你一样需要我
[02:08.40]我需要你
[02:11.12]你说你想要我的爱 我信了你
[02:14.12]但你总是忽略我 仿佛我是透明人
[02:17.48]告诉我 你是不是像我需要你一样需要我
[02:21.39]我需要你
[02:22.84]//
[02:23.90]玫瑰是红的 紫罗兰是蓝的
[02:27.21]我的心死了 我真是个傻瓜
[02:30.13]//
[02:30.51]为何我会爱上你
[02:33.82]我为你付出了一切
[02:36.93]玫瑰是红的
[02:38.24]//
[02:38.65]紫罗兰是蓝的
[02:39.79]//
[02:40.27]我的心死了
[02:41.34]//
[02:41.87]我真是个傻瓜
[02:43.07]//
[02:43.49]为何我会爱上你
[02:46.76]我为你付出了一切
[02:49.79]//
[03:04.64]她让我逍遥自在
[03:06.45]我开始感觉自己承受的爱像枷锁
[03:09.77]我开始感觉所有的谎言像真理
[03:12.53]到头来 其实我在撒谎 我在利用你
[03:17.34]我受够了嘲笑
[03:19.29]你玩弄我的真心 你让我像个傻瓜
[03:22.77]这就是个悲剧 公之于众就可以结束了
[03:26.06]我没时间伺候任何人 绝不伺候这些蠢货
[03:29.11]//
[03:31.80]到头来 你要怎么做
[03:34.63]到头来 我不想和你在一起了
[03:37.89]到头来 我还是会做真实的自己
